alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 2:19PM CDT until May 07 at 4:06AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma...Arkansas... Lee Creek near Van Buren affecting Crawford and Sequoyah Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lee Creek near Van Buren. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 402.0 feet, the access road into Tailwater Park may be impassable due to high water. The recreational vehicle campground near Rena Road is affected by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:27 AM CDT Friday the stage was 402.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 402.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 401.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
